    SimpleSyncService Class Reference

    Inherits from NSObject
    Declared in SimpleSyncService.h

    Tasks

    • – initWithAdapters:useQueue:

      Sets up a service instance to trigger adapters at intervals to fetch data for updating a data model
    • – start

      Start synchronization tasks
    • – stop

      Stops all synchronization tasks
    • + synchronizeData:withEntityName:inContext:withIdentifierNamed:

      Synchronize Core Data entity instances with an array of updated model data in dictionaries
    • + synchronizeData:withEntityName:withIdentifierNamed:useQueue:

      Synchronize Core Data entity instances with an array of updated model data in dictionaries

    Class Methods

    synchronizeData:withEntityName:inContext:withIdentifierNamed:

    Synchronize Core Data entity instances with an array of updated model data in dictionaries

    + (BOOL)synchronizeData:(NSArray *)data withEntityName:(NSString *)entityName inContext:(NSManagedObjectContext *)context withIdentifierNamed:(NSString *)identifierPropertyName

    Parameters

    data

    an NSArray of NSDictionary instances

    entityName

    the name of the entity model to be synchronized

    context

    an NSManagedObjectContext on which Core Data tasks should be performed

    identifierPropertyName

    a property name with corresponding unique values in the data array objects and the core data model

    Discussion

    Synchronize Core Data entity instances with an array of updated model data in dictionaries

    Declared In

    SimpleSyncService.h

    synchronizeData:withEntityName:withIdentifierNamed:useQueue:

    Synchronize Core Data entity instances with an array of updated model data in dictionaries

    + (void)synchronizeData:(NSArray *)data withEntityName:(NSString *)entityName withIdentifierNamed:(NSString *)identifierPropertyName useQueue:(NSOperationQueue *)queue

    Parameters

    data

    an NSArray of NSDictionary instances

    entityName

    the name of the entity model to be synchronized

    identifierPropertyName

    a property name with corresponding unique values in the data array objects and the core data model

    queue

    a queue on which the service should run Core Data operations. When nil, the service will use the main queue.

    Discussion

    Synchronize Core Data entity instances with an array of updated model data in dictionaries

    Declared In

    SimpleSyncService.h

    Instance Methods

    initWithAdapters:useQueue:

    Sets up a service instance to trigger adapters at intervals to fetch data for updating a data model

    - (id)initWithAdapters:(NSArray *)adapters useQueue:(NSOperationQueue *)queue

    Parameters

    adapters

    an array of DMMSyncServiceAdapter instances. When nil, the sync service does nothing

    queue

    a queue on which the service should run Core Data operations. When nil, the service will use the main queue.

    Discussion

    Sets up a service instance to trigger adapters at intervals to fetch data for updating a data model

    Declared In

    SimpleSyncService.h

    start

    Start synchronization tasks

    - (void)start

    Discussion

    Start synchronization tasks

    Declared In

    SimpleSyncService.h

    stop

    Stops all synchronization tasks

    - (void)stop

    Discussion

    Stops all synchronization tasks
